info.game_comments:
Matt Jackson game 10.

(Peabody: To convince Alex Trebek that the world adores him more with facial hair, Sherman and I set the WABAC to 1984, Culver City, Jeopardy! studios, for Alex to try...)
(Sherman: The Trebek!)
(Alex: Been there, done that.)

WE ASKED: Actress Wendi McLendon-Covey.

(1, 1).clue: It's home to the state capital

(4, 1).clue: Naturally, Hawaiian pizza is topped with this fruit

(5, 1).clue: Born Michigan, 1863,assembled quite a resume as an industrialist,died Michigan, 1947

(1, 2).clue: Wowie!  This second-biggest island is named for a Polynesian demigod

(2, 2).clue: (Hi.  I'm Wendi McLendon-Covey.)  In 2012 I shared the MTV Movie Award for Best Gut-Wrenching Performance with Kristen Wiig, Ellie Kemper, Maya Rudolph, Melissa McCarthy & Rose Byrne for a scene in this film

(3, 2).clue: What was British Guiana is now called this

(4, 2).clue: Pizza al funghi is topped with these, perhaps cremini
